Writing: The Process Approach.What do yo: Note down as manyideas as you can about a given topic. Then arrange the ideas in a sequence.
Create an outline of your writing- which ideas will go first, how will they be supported by evidence, will there be a picture, etc.
Write the first draft; here the focus is on the content and not the form.
Revise the first draft, improve it. Add or delete ideas and improve the language.
Proofread the draft with the help of the teacher; here the focus is on the form and not the content.
